eb:/ipfs/QmbcBmFX66AY6Kbhnd5gx7zpkgqnUafo43XnmayAM7zVdB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/MicroLoan.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9d2c1b896d514963ad4e015ba6eef878ba758b28f77a0db53e7a981eb754fd9d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://30bae58e17f4e91904b724b21f441797ddd52ea84e2d5485dc811b88de9c624b","dweb:/ipfs/QmNtbjfmPt3HAanifxShPvUV66cqEzJQTT7dfDwp72a1Yb"]}},"version":1}

cancelFundraise().details: Only callable by borrower. Opens refunds for existing contributors.

cancelIfNoDisburse().details: Callable by anyone after disbursement window expires. Opens refunds for contributors.

claim().details: Uses accumulator pattern for efficient distribution

params.contributor: Address of the contributor to check

returns._0: Amount of tokens the contributor can currently claim

contribute(uint256).details: Reverts if fundraising inactive, deadline passed, or would exceed principal

params.amount: Amount of funding token to contribute (in base units, e.g., 1000000 = 1 USDC)

returns._0: timestamp when loan becomes defaulted if unpaid, or 0 if no payment due

disburse().details: Only callable by borrower, within disbursement window after full fundingReverts if not fully funded, already disbursed, or disbursement window expired

isDefaulted().details: Borrowers can still repay even when defaulted - this is status only

returns._0: true if payment is overdue beyond grace period and principal remains

refund().details: Available if: (1) borrower cancelled, or (2) deadline passed without full funding

repay(uint256).details: Anyone can repay on behalf of borrower. Payments applied to periods in order.Overpayments are refunded. Emits LoanDefaulted event if loan was in default.

params.amount: Amount to repay (excess beyond outstanding principal will be refunded)

cancelFundraise().notice: Borrower can cancel fundraising before full funding is reached

cancelIfNoDisburse().notice: Cancel a fully-funded loan if borrower fails to disburse within the window

claim().notice: Claim your share of repaid principal

claimableAmount(address).notice: View function to check claimable repayment amount for a contributor

contribute(uint256).notice: Contribute funds to this loan during the fundraising period

defaultDeadline().notice: Get the deadline including grace period (when loan becomes defaulted)

disburse().notice: Disburse the fully-funded loan to the borrower

isDefaulted().notice: Check if the loan is currently in default

refund().notice: Claim refund if loan was cancelled or failed to reach funding goal
